analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/29/0xfd6be1247a5d32ee83aad9d1b09b5df9e2988d6f.sol:
	Contract DoubleKingsReward has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0xfd6be1247a5d32ee83aad9d1b09b5df9e2988d6f.sol#205)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
